sub_title: Creative Business Director | When it's big, complicated and seems impossible: I am your man!
summary:
As a global citizen, I’ve always chased challenging jobs and projects, where creative excellence and craft are at its best. I have worked for the world’s top-notch agencies (a.o. Wieden + Kennedy) and brands and bring a wealth of international production, marketing and business understanding, covering the full range of storytelling and engagement: TV commercials, feature films, on-line content, web series, documentaries, and yes, even a theme park ride.

Many A-level directors, Superstars and international (sports-)celebrities have worked with me and I am the only Dutch person who ever won the Grand Prix at Cannes Lions, twice.

I am comfortable leading large teams, often as MT member, and I’m very experienced managing various cultural teams over multi countries. I like to simplify and unravel to the core and build a construct from there.

Amsterdam based, with a strong local connection, I operate anywhere in the world and have my own consultancy now; where my ‘outside the box’ approach turns out to be very successful.

education.field_of_study: communication, marketing, management, advertising, economics, law, English and Spanish.

awards.title: International Awards
awards.description: I won numerous international awards at all the acclaimed award shows: Cannes Lions, Eurobest, Effie's, One Show, D&AD, LIA, Webby, Clio, AICP, Epica, Ciclope, ADCN, etc.

profile_positions.description:
Independent Brand, Creative & Production Consultant
Since I started my own consultancy, I have taken a.o. the following projects:
- Under Armour EMEA | RUSH Anthony Joshua & Jade Jones | HOVR campaign UK & DE
- 17 Sport Paris | DPD Group | Adidas, Breaking Barriers 
- Halal Film Amsterdam | Lynk & Co, European introduction 
- Booking.com | Director of Production & Operations ai | Senior Global Producer
- Hogarth Worldwide Singapore | Global GSK Panadol campaign
- Vodafone | Red Business | European Introduction campaign
- Colourful Rebel | Brand strategy | The Young & Restless campaign
- Exin Financial Services Group Barcelona | COO ai
- Stage Entertainment Amsterdam | Brand re-positioning | The Bodyguard campaign
- Pargues Reunidos Group Madrid | Bobbejaanland Belgium | Theme park 3D experience ride
profile_positions.title: Creative Business Director | Owner

profile_positions.description:
Setting up the processes needed within Halal agency to service an automotive client like Lynk & Co and to develop the European introduction campaign:
- Establish fee structures with Volvo procurement in Sweden. 
- Develop overall creative brand strategy.
- Develop 'digital first' creative concepts for the European marketing campaigns.
- Key liaison to digital agency, re funnel architecture &  media buy.
profile_positions.title: Business Director + Process & Operations Lead for 'Lynk & Co'

profile_positions.description:
Director of Production & Operations, a.i.			
Besides overseeing and guiding the global team of producers, designers, project managers, etc. with the production of various campaigns for USA & Canada, Mexico, China, EMEA, LATAM, Indonesia, and the sponsorship campaigns for UEFA Champions League and ICC Cricket World Cup, I also have been very much involved in:
•	Managing the global production and agency budget. Budget for next year.
•	The development of creative work, with a ‘digital first’ focus.
•	Leading the RFP & pitch processes for four major creative agency pitches: USA, EMEA, UEFA and SE Asia, working closely with the various teams: marketing comms, business & consumer insights, media and procurement.
•	Overseeing the China production hub in Shanghai; developing campaigns with local creative agencies and freelance talent.
•	Developing 'Advertising as Entertainment’; new long-format content forms & series concepts. Also for sister company ‘rentalcars.com’.
•	Integrating all creative work throughout social media and PR.
•	South-East Asia workshop in Singapore on winning in Indonesia and in other emerging markets.

Senior Global Producer - EMEA, Russia & Australia
Developing brand strategy and overarching, - digital first -, creative marketing campaign for EMEA, Russia & Australia. Consecutively, I produced the campaign as well, called 'Live Curious', which performed very well, won numerous awards and is the best creative work Booking.com has turned out in many years. 

Senior Global Producer - China launch campaign				
Creatively developing and producing the launch campaign for Booking.com into China. We developed this campaign in-house with freelance creative teams. 

Senior Global Producer - UEFA Champions League 
Developing the global creative strategy and global marketing campaign for the UEFA Champions League sponsorship.
profile_positions.title: Director of Production & Operations, a.i. | Senior Global Producer

profile_positions.description:
GSK Panadol ‘Toughies’
Developing and producing a global ‘documentary style’ campaign for GSK’s Panadol, in collaboration with Hogarth Worldwide and Grey Advertising, Singapore. 

We made portraits of people ‘who do good for others’, based on the following situations:

Africa | Empowering women to set up their own fish-farms, in Kenya & Nigeria.
LATAM | Running a school and refuge for 1100 teenage mothers in Cartagena, Colombia. 
SE Asia | Reviving a dying village in mid Java Indonesia, through traditional dance. 
Middle East | Running through the 7 UAE Emirates to raise awareness for disabled children.
China & Taiwan | A shelter for street-kids in Taitung (South Taiwan), teaching them to read.
profile_positions.title: Development & Production of GSK Panadol 'Toughies' Docu Campaign

profile_positions.description:
As the Head of Production, I have been overseeing the 5 disciplines of the W+K Amsterdam Broadcast Department: Agency Producers, Digital Producers, Business Affairs Managers, Art Buying and the AV studio. Working on regional and global campaigns for clients like Nike, EA FIFA, Heineken, Coca Cola, General Electric, Honda and Booking.com, etc.

I was part of the Management Team and gave guidance to a team of approximately 25 people (often topped up with freelancers) and was involved in all levels of intergraded production: content films, on-line, long format/series, print, and installation; often collaborating with international superstars and (sports) celebrities. These projects were shot/produced all over the world, teaming up with many of the world’s leading directors, production companies and post houses.
 
In the summer of 2010, I was responsible for the ‘Nike Write The Future’ digital and TVC production-, one of the biggest commercial projects ever realized and directed by Oscar winning director Alejandro Iñárritu (Babel, Birdman, The Revenant), which won the Grand Prix at Cannes Lions Festival 2011. In June 2013 we also won the Creative Effectiveness Grand Prix at Cannes Lions for Heineken, which was for all the integrated work for three global Heineken ‘Open Your World’ campaigns, for which I oversaw all production: ‘Entrance’, ‘Date ‘and for ‘James Bond Skyfall’ (Express). 

I am the only Dutch person who ever won the Grand Prix at Cannes Lions, twice.
profile_positions.title: Director of Integrated Production

profile_positions.description:
At Wieden + Kennedy, I produced :
-  Nike TVC for the Olympic Games with notorious runner Oscar Pistorius.
-  Honda ‘Let is Shine’ TVC, airing in 128 markets.
-  Documentary series called ‘Wodka Wars’ with VICE NYC, creatively supervised by Spike Jonze.
profile_positions.title: Senior Agency Producer

profile_positions.description:
For IDTV Film (now Topkapi Films)
During a 7-week period, we had 37 days of shooting in Argentina and Paraguay with a local Indian community in the Northern part of the state of Misiones for Dutch feature film ‘First Mission’ Film. The movie was directed by Boris Paval Conen and had its theatrical release in February 2010. This production was also released as TV-series for Dutch broadcaster NCRV. I was in Argentina for a total of 3 months for prep, shoot and (financial) wrap up.
profile_positions.title: Production Supervisor Argentina 'First Mission'

profile_positions.description:
For IDTV Film (now Topkapi Films)
Overseeing the New Zealand leg for the shooting of 'Bride Flight': a full-length international feature film, directed by Academy Award® nominated director Ben Sombogaart. This epic movie, situated in 1953, 1963 and the present time, was shot in Luxembourg, France and throughout New Zealand and is one of the more expensive feature film projects coming out of The Netherlands.

As a 'Production Supervisor for New Zealand', I was in charge for setting up and managing the New Zealand leg of this part of the production, reporting to the films overall line-producer.

During a six-week period, we had 22 days of all-location-shooting, throughout 9 different areas in New Zealand, on both the North and South Island, travelling with an average cast and crew of 100 people.  

'Bride Flight' had its theatrical release in The Netherlands in October 2008 and also be aired on television as a 3-part miniseries for Dutch TV-station NCRV in 2011 and has had many re-runs since. The film was released in the rest of Europe, North America, Asia, Australia and New Zealand from mid 2009 onwards. 

It was for the first time in over 25 years that native actor Rutger Hauer (Blade Runner) performed in a Dutch film again.
profile_positions.title: Production Supervisor New Zealand 'Bride Flight'

profile_positions.description:
Managing Director of the Broadcast Department of the Singapore office and overseeing all of the TV & Production departments in the Asia-Pacific region (41 countries).
- Built the department from two to nine production staff members. 
- Led it become centre of excellence on TV production in the region.
- Structure quality of output in the region.
- Setting up work protocols in region.
- Mentor to junior talent.
- Tripling revenue. 

Ogilvy Singapore is considered one of the most creative agencies in Asia and received the 3rd ‘worldwide agency of the year’ award at the Cannes International Advertising Festival in June 2007.
profile_positions.title: Regional Head of Broadcast Production Asia-Pacific

profile_positions.description: Ogilvy & Mather Asia Pacific asked me to do a full audit of their Unilever Broadcast Production Hub in Hong Kong. This ‘hub’ operates as an entire ‘separate’ agency and works for Pond’s globally and Dove and also for GSK and North West Airlines regionally. I audited the TV production, print production (art buying) and traffic departments, on organizational, operational, as well as on creative output and financial levels.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant Unilever Production Hub

profile_positions.description: Re-organizing and re-structuring the Broadcast Department of international advertising agency Ogilvy & Mather in Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description: Producing international commercials and print shoots for the 4 directors and 4 photographers at Hazazah, one of Holland’s top commercial production houses.
profile_positions.title: Senior Producer

profile_positions.description:
For Bates Advertising Singapore (now Bates CHI&Partners)
Producing 2 worldwide Heineken television commercials for Bates Advertising in Singapore: ‘Migration’  for the Rugby World Cup, shot in Africa, Australia and New Zealand. 
The 2nd one was with MJZ Los Angeles (director Rocky Morton) and shot in London.
profile_positions.title: Senior Agency Producer
